tourpackage.name: Samal Island Eco Adventure Tour
tourpackage.metadescription: A Samal island outdoor and eco adventure tour that includes snorkeling, a short island cruise, picnic lunch at the beach, a visit to Hagimit falls and see the largest fruit bat colony in the world.
tourpackage.metatitle: Philippine Tours | Samal Island Eco Adventure Tour - 8 hours
tourpackage.info:
Itinerary

Samal Inland:

  • Paradise Beach Resort
  • Uraya Beach resort (swimming and lunch)
  • Monfort Bat Sanctuary (sightseeing)
  • Hagimit Falls (swimming)

Samal Island Hopping:

  • Vanishing Sand Bar (swimming)
  • Pass by Pearl Farm Beach Resort
  • Pass by Malipano Island
  • Taclobo Giant Clam Sanctuary (snorkeling)
  • Narnia Wishing Island (sightseeing/swimming)

Inclusions

  • Air-conditioned transportation for hotel pick-up and transfers
  • Services of a tourist guide
  • Environmental fees and permits
  • Packed lunch
  • All applicable entrance fees as specified in the itinerary
  • Private tour

Conditions

  • Guests will shoulder the meal expenses not specified in the tour inclusions
  • Guests will shoulder the aquasports rental fee at the resorts
  • In excess of the alloted time, there will be an excess usage charge of
    • P350/hour for car/van
    • P1000 for coaster
    • P1500 for bus usage

Extra notes

  • This tour is exclusive - meaning we can not join/mix you with other groups
  • Some roads in Samal are still rough and unpaved
  • It is advisable to wear light and comfortable clothes and aqua shoes during the trip
  • Special Holiday / Peak Season (Holy week, Dec. 31 to Jan. 2, Dec. 23 to 26) additional 5% from the rates given
  • All rates are subject to change without prior notice
